T02D2672:58a-18: phul pas rgya che bar khong du chud par bya'o
T02D2672:58a-19: // bsod nams don du blta zhes bya ba ni
T02D2672:58a-20: der zhugs na bsod nams 'phel zhes bya ba'i tha
T02D2672:58a-21: // tshig go // sna tshogs pa'i gdon zhes bya
T02D2672:58a-22: ba ni gdon gyi rigs stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa
T02D2672:58a-24: rnam pa sna tshogs las byed pa'i //

T02D2672:58b-1: 'khor gyi rgyal po der thams cad kyi dam tshig

T02D2672:58b-32: rdo rje'i bdag nyid ces bya ba la sogs pas

T02D2672:58b-35: zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni dkyil 'khor du

T02D2672:58b-37: // rig sngags ma mthong ba ni lha'i rang bzhin mi shes pa'o //
T02D2672:58b-38: dam tshig ma mthong zhes bya ba ni dam tshig
T02D2672:58b-39: gi dkyil 'khor du ma zhugs shing dam tshig mi
T02D2672:59a-0: srung ba'o // snying rje med ces bya ba ni rang bzhin @59a * //

T02D2672:59a-14: dkyil 'khor 'bri zhing 'jug ma nus na yang /
T02D2672:59a-16: gcig tsam zhig kyang dad pas mthong gyur na //

T02D2672:59a-36: rtul zhugs gnas pa zhes bya ba ni rig sngags
T02D2672:59a-37: 'chang 'jug pa la sogs pa'i dus su tshul khrims
T02D2672:59a-38: rnam pa gsum po dag la gnas pa'o //
T02D2672:59b-0: glags mi lta zhes bya @59b ba ni tshul khrims
T02D2672:59b-1: de dag la gnas pa'i phan yon gyis gong du
T02D2672:59b-2: smos pa'i gdon thams cad 'dzom nas rgol mi phod
T02D2672:59b-3: par bstan to // tshul khrims la brten nas zhes
T02D2672:59b-4: bya ba ni tshul khrims ni dge ba'i phyogs thams
T02D2672:59b-5: cad kyi rten yin par brjod pa'o //

T02D2672:59b-8: por rnam par byang ba'i phyogs skyes pa gang yin
T02D2672:59b-9: pa'o // snying rje'i chus brlan pas ni rnam par skya //
T02D2672:59b-10: zhes bya ba ni 'dir snying rje'i rtsa ba'i rlan

T02D2672:59b-12: kyi sems kyi myu gu bskyed ces bya bar sbyar
T02D2672:59b-13: ro // rgyal ba ngas gsungs zhes bya ba ni

T02D2672:59b-26: cho ga spang zhes bya ba yang lhung bzed bdug

T02D2672:59b-35: to // de ltar sdig pa'i chos las rnam grol nas //

T02D2672:59b-37: legs par gsungs pa'i phyir chos zhes bya ba ni

T02D2672:60a-5: sogs pa gdon bar bstan pa'i don to //

T02D2672:60a-9: rnams kyis gang mod pa las bya ba'i don to

T02D2672:60a-11: ba ni mchod rten gyi cha dbye ba las bde
T02D2672:60a-12: bar gshegs pa'i che ba'i yon tan de la /

T02D2672:60a-14: rten 'brel snying po can zhes bya ba ni rnam
T02D2672:60a-15: par snang mdzad mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i

T02D2672:60a-22: zhes gsungs pa 'di dang ldan par bstan to //
T02D2672:60a-23: sdig pa sbyang ba'i phyir ni rtag tu gdab //

T02D2672:60a-27: gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed de bzhin gshegs pa

T02D2672:60a-29: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i yon tan mang por
T02D2672:60a-31: ring bsrel can gyis zhes bya ba ni byang chub
T02D2672:60a-32: kyi snying po'i rgyan gyi gzungs kyi cho ga zhib
T02D2672:60a-33: mo las / chos kyi sku'i ring bsrel dang /

T02D2672:60a-35: sku bal gyi ring bsrel dang /
T02D2672:60a-37: yungs 'bru cam gyi ring bsrel zhes gsungs te //

T02D2672:60a-39: sku gzugs zhes bya ba'i mtshan nyid ni 'og mas 'chad do //

T02D2672:60a-41: rgyud chen po las bya gag gi sgo 'dra bar
T02D2672:60a-42: 'dug na dngos grub sbyin par 'gyur ro zhes gsungs
T02D2672:60a-44: bstod cing zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni lus

T02D2672:60b-1: mthun du sbyar ba'i don to //

T02D2672:60b-5: yid kyi mchod pa khyad par can //
T02D2672:60b-6: yang dag nyid du brtsam par bya //
T02D2672:60b-7: chos kyi thog mar yid 'gro zhes //
T02D2672:60b-8: thub pa chen pos bka' stsal to //

T02D2672:60b-15: tshig gi don gzhan ni go bar zad do //

T02D2672:60b-23: gsungs zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //

T02D2672:60b-27: chub ste de dag bzhugs pa'i gnas ni b'a r'a
T02D2672:60b-28: na s'i'i drang srong lhung ba'i ri la sogs pa'o

T02D2672:60b-30: chub sems dpa' rnams te de dag gi gnas nges
T02D2672:60b-31: pa ni ri bo rtse lnga la sogs pa'o //

T02D2672:60b-35: yid dga' ba zhes bya ba ni sgrub pa po gnas der mos pa'o //

T02D2672:60b-40: gso sbyong sdom pa dang ni ldan pa yis //
T02D2672:61a-0: zhes bya ba ni sgrub pa @61a * //
T02D2672:61a-2: bdag nyid dag par bya phyir brten bya ba //
T02D2672:61a-3: zhes bya ba ni rab tu grub par byed pa'i rgyud chen po las /

T02D2672:61a-7: bgegs med par yang der 'gyur ro//

T02D2672:61a-13: pa'o // mi bzad gdon rnams kyang ni mi gnas pa //
T02D2672:61a-14: zhes pa ni klu nag po gdug pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D2672:61a-15: grog po grog mkhar thal ba skra shad dang //
T02D2672:61a-16: nyal nyil sol ba tsha sgo'am btsog can spang //
T02D2672:61a-17: zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gnas kyi mtshan
T02D2672:61a-18: nyid mngon par 'dus byas pa'i yon tan dang ldan
T02D2672:61a-20: lho phyogs su ni nam yang sgo mi gdod //

T02D2672:61a-40: sbyar ro // thag pas btags zhes bya ba la

T02D2672:91b-20: dngos su lngas rtsen gyi btsun mo 'phrog ma yin no //
T02D2672:91b-21: de la lngas rtsen yang ni mngon par dga' //
T02D2672:91b-22: zhes bya ba ni rigs kyi bdag pos de rgyal mor bsgo bar dga' ba'i don to //
T02D2672:91b-23: gnod sbyin dbang phyug ces bya ba ni rgyas pa'i
T02D2672:91b-24: rigs la gtogs pa'i gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon rnams
T02D2672:91b-25: so // de dang rtag tu mthun pa zhes bya
T02D2672:91b-26: ba ni lngas rtsen dang gnod sbyin gyi gtso bo
T02D2672:91b-28: 'og pa can 'dis rgyas pa'i rigs kyi gsang sngags kyi bdag mor dbang bskur ba'i don to //
T02D2672:91b-29: de yi bka' yis gsang sngags tshogs rnams bshad //
T02D2672:91b-30: ces bya ba ni 'og pag can rgyas pa'i rigs
T02D2672:91b-31: kyi rgyud rnams bshad ces bya ba'i tha tshig go
T02D2672:91b-32: // lngas rtsen gyis ni stong phrag nyi shu ste //
T02D2672:91b-33: zhes bya ba ni rgyas pa'i rigs la lngas rtsen
T02D2672:91b-34: gyi rgyud du grags pa ni shlo ka nyi khri'o
T02D2672:91b-35: // de yi chung ma zhes bya ba ni 'phrog ma nyid de /
T02D2672:92a-1: bshad do zhes bya ba ni shlo ka khri bshad pa'i don to //
T02D2672:92a-2: nor gyi bdag po zhes bya ba ni rigs lnga pa nor bu'i rigs bstan pa ste /
T02D2672:92a-3: dngos su dpal nor bu bzang po'o //
T02D2672:92a-4: stong phrag sum cu zhes bya ba ni nor bu'i
T02D2672:92a-5: rigs la dpal nor bu bzang po'i rgyud du grags
T02D2672:92a-6: pa ni shlo ka sum khri bshad par bstan to
T02D2672:92a-7: // gang po'i pha zhes bya ba ni lha'i drang srong rnam thos zhes bya ba yin no //
T02D2672:92a-8: lha dang lha min la sogs rgyal ba la /
T02D2672:92a-9: dad pa rnams kyis gsang sngags mtha' yas bshad //
T02D2672:92a-10: ces bya ba ni sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems
T02D2672:92a-11: dpa' rnams kyi spyan sngar gnang zhing rjes su thugs
T02D2672:92a-12: rangs nas so so nas bshad pa'o //
T02D2672:92a-13: gzhan yang kha cig gnas med rnam par 'khyam //
T02D2672:92a-14: zhes bya ba ni pha rol tu phyin pas bskyed
T02D2672:92a-15: pa'i rigs bzhi po de dag gi bgab tu ma
T02D2672:92a-16: bsdus pa'o // gzhan ni go bar zad do //
T02D2672:92a-17: ngas bshad gang yin de zhes bya ba ni 'jig
T02D2672:92a-18: rten pa'i rigs rgyal ba la dad pa rnams so
T02D2672:92a-19: // bzhi po 'di dag rnam par sbyang bar bya //
T02D2672:92a-20: zhes bya ba ni de dag gi rigs bzhi po'i bgab tu phal cher 'dus par bstan to //
T02D2672:92a-21: gang gzhan la la 'di na gnas med par //
T02D2672:92a-22: zhes bya ba ni rigs bzhir ma bsdus pa rnams so //
T02D2672:92a-23: bde bar gshegs la brten zhes bya ba ni dad
T02D2672:92a-24: pas sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar so so'i cho ga
T02D2672:92a-26: yongs 'khyam pa zhes bya ba ni de dag rigs lnga char gyis ma bsdus pa'i don to //
T02D2672:92a-27: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su ma bsdus sam zhe na /
T02D2672:92a-28: de'i rigs su gtogs pa ni gtsug tor la sogs pa ye shes las byung ba yin la /
T02D2672:92a-29: 'di dag ni rnam par smin pas bskyed pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2672:92a-30: mdo sde 'dir ni zhes bya ba ni dpung bzangs
T02D2672:92a-31: kyis zhus pa'i rgyud 'dir zhes bya ba'i don to
T02D2672:92a-32: // de dag thams cad kyang zhes bya ba ni 'phags pa'i rigs lnga dang /
T02D2672:92a-33: 'jig rten pa'i rigs dang drug car ro //
T02D2672:92a-34: rnam par sbyang zhes bya ba ni rgyud 'di cho ga thams cad la sbyar bar bstan to //
T02D2672:92a-35: srid pa gsum zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa dang gzugs dang gzugs med pa'o //
T02D2672:92a-36: rgyal ba zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas so //
T02D2672:92b-0: dkon pa zhes bya ba ni au dumw'a ra'i me tog dang 'dra ba'i don @92b to ;
T02D2672:92b-1: / mchog ces bya ba ni yid bzhin gyi nor
T02D2672:92b-2: bu ltar de dang yon tan mnyam pa med pa'i
T02D2672:92b-3: phyir ro // de yi 'og tu de las byung ba'i chos //
T02D2672:92b-4: zhes bya ba ni rang gi don du rtogs pa'i chos thugs su chud pa dang /
T02D2672:92b-5: gzhan gyi don du lung gi chos nges par bstan pa rnams so //
T02D2672:92b-6: de'i dge 'dun zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas kyi
T02D2672:92b-7: bstan pa la rab tu byung ba'i 'phags pa nyan
T02D2672:92b-8: thos rnams so // skyes chen brgyad po zhes bya
T02D2672:92b-9: ba ni rgyun du zhugs pa la sogs pa zung
T02D2672:92b-11: srid pa gsum na dkon mchog gsum po gtso //
T02D2672:92b-12: zhes bya ba ni khams gsum pa thams cad kyis
T02D2672:92b-13: mchod cing bkur sti bya ba'i 'os bla na med
T02D2672:92b-14: par bstan to // gzhan ni go bar zad do //
T02D2672:92b-15: bde bar gshegs pa min zhes bya ba ni theg pa chen po la mi phyogs pa rnams so //
T02D2672:92b-16: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi lam la
T02D2672:92b-17: gnas pa dang zhes bya ba ni theg pa dman
T02D2672:92b-19: dad pa med cing zhes bya ba ni gsang sngags kyi phyogs lam dad pa'o //
T02D2672:92b-20: tshul 'chos zhes bya ba ni gzhan la slu ba'i
T02D2672:92b-21: bsam pas gsang sngags kyi sgo nas theg pa chen
T02D2672:92b-22: po la dad pa ltar spyod lam bsgyur ba'o //
T02D2672:92b-23: 'jungs pa zhes bya ba ni ser snas kun nas dkris pa'o //
T02D2672:92b-24: gzhan ni go sla bas ma phye'o //
T02D2672:92b-25: gang gi nga yi rjes su 'brang ba'i gdon //
T02D2672:92b-26: 'byung po klu dang gnod sbyin sha za yi //
T02D2672:92b-27: zhes bya ba ni rnam par smin pas bskyed pa'i
T02D2672:92b-28: 'jig rten las ma 'das pa de dag phyag na
T02D2672:92b-29: rdo rje'i byin gyi rlabs kyis btul nas /
T02D2672:92b-30: so so nas dam tshig phul te rdo rje'i rigs su bsdus pa rnams so //
T02D2672:92b-31: nga yi sngags zlos rdo rje thogs pa dang //
T02D2672:92b-32: zhes bya ba ni bshad ma thag pa'i snod du ma gyur pa rnams so //
T02D2672:92b-33: phung bar byed ces bya ba ni gsod pa'am rigs
T02D2672:92b-34: kyang rlag par byed ces bya ba'i tha tshig go
T02D2672:92b-35: // theg pa mchog ces bya ba ni theg pa chen po ste /
T02D2672:92b-36: de'i bla mar gyur pa gzhan med pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2672:92b-37: rgya chen zhes bya ba ni theg pa gzhan las
T02D2672:92b-38: khyad par du dmigs pa la sogs pa khyad zhugs
T02D2672:93a-0: brtson 'grus che zhing zhes bya ba ni bdag dang gzhan gyi don du brtson pa'i @93a * //
T02D2672:93a-2: byang chub kyi sems brtan pa zhes bya ba ni brtson 'grus dang ting nge 'dzin dang /
T02D2672:93a-3: shes rab mtshungs par ldan pas byang chub kyi sems gzung ba'i tha tshig go //
T02D2672:93a-4: sangs rgyas pa'i gsang sngags zhes bya ba ni rigs lngas bsdus pa'o //
T02D2672:93a-5: yangs shing zhes bya ba ni sgo mang po nas drangs pa'i don to //
T02D2672:93a-6: rgya chen bshad pa zhes bya ba ni 'bras bu
T02D2672:93a-7: chen po dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig
T02D2672:93a-8: go // de nas zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas
T02D2672:93a-9: dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis 'dul ba'i skye
T02D2672:93a-11: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i gsang sngags rnams kyi rgyud
T02D2672:93a-12: gtsor bshad pa'i skabs nas glengs pa'i de ma thag
T02D2672:93a-13: pa'o // gzhan yang 'jig rten pa bsdus nas zhar
T02D2672:93a-14: la bshad pa 'di dag ces bya ba ni 'jig
T02D2672:93a-15: rten las 'das pa'i rgyud kyi sdom bshad pa'i zla
T02D2672:93a-16: ba glengs zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02D2672:93a-17: drag po zhes bya ba ni lha chen po'i ming gi rnam grangs so //
T02D2672:93a-18: nor lha'i bu zhes bya ba ni khyab 'jug gi rnam grangs so //
T02D2672:93a-19: gtum byed ma zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten pa'i
T02D2672:93a-20: rig sngags kyi lha mo skal ldan ma zhes brjod
T02D2672:93a-21: pa ste / mkha' 'gro rnams kyi lha zhes kyang grag go //
T02D2672:93a-22: phur bu gsum pa zhes bya ba ni gdol pa'i rgyal po'o //
T02D2672:93a-23: mtshan mo rgyu ba'i dbang po zhes bya ba ni gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon rnams so //
T02D2672:93a-24: 'jig rten bdag po bzhi zhes bya ba ni rgyal po chen po rnams so //
T02D2672:93a-25: lha'i dbang ngo zhes bya ba ni brgya byin no //
T02D2672:93a-26: rang sngags mdo sde'i rjes 'brangs zhes bya ba ni so so'i tshul ma nyams pa ste /
T02D2672:93a-27: gzhan gyi cho ga dang ma bsres zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02D2672:93a-28: dad pa skyed ces bya ba ni so so'i lha
T02D2672:93a-29: de dag la dang pas the tshom med par sgrub
T02D2672:93a-30: pa'o // de las bzlog na dngos grub mi thob la //
T02D2672:93a-31: zhes bya ba ni so so'i cho ga dang 'gal bar bsgrub pa dang /
T02D2672:93a-32: lha de dag nyid la ma dad pa rnams so //
T02D2672:93a-33: sdug bsngal mang po yang ni thob par 'gyur //
T02D2672:93a-34: zhes bya ba ni bzlas brjod la sogs pa'i las chen po ni byas la /
T02D2672:93a-36: yang na de dag 'khrugs nas nyen du gyur ba'i don to //
T02D2672:93a-37: le'u bcu pa'i don bshad zin to /
T02D2672:93a-39: // / bcud len zhes bya ba ni sman bcud len te /
T02D2672:93b-0: de yang @93b khams las byung ba dang /
T02D2672:93b-2: srog chags kyi lus las byung ba dang /
T02D2672:93b-3: lde gu dang rnam pa bzhi'o //
T02D2672:93b-4: de dag gi phan yon ni tshe ring ba dang /
T02D2672:93b-7: slar gzhon nur gyur pa ste /
T02D2672:93b-8: de yang gsang sngags mnyes pa'i sgo nas ;
T02D2672:93b-9: bcud len gyi mthu 'grub kyis skal pa med pa rnams la ni ma yin te /
T02D2672:93b-10: rdo rje gtsug tor gyi rgyud las kyang /
T02D2672:93b-12: sman gyi yang ni lus can la //
T02D2672:93b-13: nye bar gyur dang sngags grub pas //
T02D2672:93b-14: dbang du gyur par rtag par ro //
T02D2672:93b-16: lha dang mi'i gter zhes bya ba ni sa la yod do //
T02D2672:93b-17: de la lha'i gter kha gab yod de /
T02D2672:93b-18: de phye na ri lu dang lig bu mig dang mchil lham dang glegs bam dag 'byung ste /
T02D2672:93b-19: de dag gi phan yon ni nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang /
T02D2672:93b-20: lus mi snang bar 'gyur ba dang /
T02D2672:93b-22: bstan bcos thams cad la thogs pa med pa'i blo dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
T02D2672:93b-23: mi'i gter ni gser dang dngul dang rin po che sna tshogs dag 'byung ba'o //
T02D2672:93b-24: lha ma yin gyi phug tu 'gro ba zhes bya
T02D2672:93b-25: ba ni dpal gyi sgo dang slas kyi sgo nas
T02D2672:93b-26: 'gro ste / de la dpal gyi phug gi sgo
T02D2672:93b-27: dbye ba ni lha'i gter gyi dngos grub rnams las
T02D2672:93b-28: gang yang rung ba cig thob par 'gyur ro //
T02D2672:93b-29: slas kyi phug gi sgo dbye na ni lha ma yin gyi bu mo dang phrad de /
T02D2672:93b-30: lha ma yin gyi gnas su khrid nas de dag dang 'tsho zhing bskal par gnas par 'gyur ro //
T02D2672:93b-31: nor rgyun ma zhes bya ba ni sman sna tshogs
T02D2672:93b-32: bsdus nas ro nye la sogs pa las gser dngul
T02D2672:93b-33: du byed pa'o // 'byung khungs zhes bya ba ni gser dngul la sogs pa'i khron phyin pa'o //
T02D2672:93b-34: gsang sngags kyi dngos grub ces bya ba ni 'jig rten las 'das pa dang /
T02D2672:93b-35: 'jig rten pa'i lha mnyes pa thob pa'o //
T02D2672:93b-36: gser sgyur rtsi zhes bya ni dngul chu'i rigs gser
T02D2672:93b-37: du snang ba zhes bya ba cig yod de de
T02D2672:93b-38: ni srang gcig gis lcags srang stong gser du sgyur
T02D2672:93b-39: nus la dngul chu srang gcig po des ni lcags
T02D2672:93b-40: srang stong po des zad par bya ba'am /
T02D2672:93b-41: lcags bsgyur bar mi nus so zer /
T02D2672:93b-42: la la na rer sa zhes bya ba dngul chu 'dra ba zhig yod de /
T02D2672:94a-1: thigs pa gcig gis zangs srang stong gser du sgyur nus zhes grag go //
T02D2672:94a-2: rin thang med pa'i rin chen nor sbyin te //
T02D2672:94a-3: zhes bya ba ni nor gyi rgyun grub pa'o //
T02D2672:94a-4: sdig pa spong bar byed pas zhes bya ba ni
T02D2672:94a-5: rnam pa de dag 'dod pas bsod nams khyad par
T02D2672:94a-6: can la brten dgos pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2672:94a-7: mchog tu ston zhes bya ba ni dam pa brgyad
T02D2672:94a-8: po de rnams kyi nang na 'bras bu che ba'i
T02D2672:94a-9: phyir ro // dang por bstan pa'i snod ces bya ba ni gsang sngags grub pa dang /
T02D2672:94a-10: bug tu 'gro ba dang bcud kyis len grub pa'o //
T02D2672:94a-11: rdul zhes bya ba ni 'dir 'dod chags kyi dri ma las dgongs so //
T02D2672:94a-12: shes che ba zhes bya ba ni sgrub pa po
T02D2672:94a-13: la la'i rgyud la 'dod chags kyi bag la nyal
T02D2672:94a-15: 'bring po rnams grub par 'gyur zhes bya ba ni
T02D2672:94a-16: rin po che la sogs pa nor gyi rgyun dang
T02D2672:94a-17: / 'byung khungs kyi khron phyin pa ste /
T02D2672:94a-18: de dag ni 'dod chags kyi shas che bas kyang 'grub par bstan to //
T02D2672:94a-19: tha ma zhes bya ba ni gser dang nor bsgyur ba'i rtsi ste /
T02D2672:94a-20: sbyor ba dka' zhing chud za la 'bras bu chud za ba'i phyir ro //
T02D2672:94a-21: mun pa zhes bya ba ni yang dag pa'i don la sgrib pas gti mug la bya'o //
T02D2672:94a-22: rten zhes bya ba ni gti mug gi shas che ba'i sgrub pa pos /
T02D2672:94a-23: las gong ma dag ni mi lcogs pa'i phyir /
T02D2672:94a-24: tha ma tsam la brten dgos par bstan to //
T02D2672:94a-25: gang zhig mchog tu bstan pa bsten 'dod pas /
T02D2672:94a-26: zhes bya ba ni bcud kyis len la sogs pa dang por bstan pa rnams sgrub par 'dod pa'o //
T02D2672:94a-27: des ni tha mar bstan pa rnam par spang //
T02D2672:94a-28: zhes bya ba ni gser sgyur la sogs pa'i las phran tshogs mi bya bar bstan to //
T02D2672:94a-29: ji ltar tshabs kyi mda' bdar ba bzhin du sngar mi spyad pa dang 'dra'o //
T02D2672:94a-30: gal te nor la sred cing sdug bsngal gyis //
T02D2672:94a-31: gdungs na 'bring po la ni bsten par bya //
T02D2672:94a-32: zhes bya ba ni sgrub pa po dang dngos grub
T02D2672:94a-33: mchog sgrub pa'i yon tan gzhan rnams yod la srid
T02D2672:94a-34: pa'i shas che na zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2672:94a-35: lha'i bde ba zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gong du smos pa'i 'bras bu rnams brjod pa'o //
T02D2672:94a-37: chags dang rnam bral zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni /
T02D2672:94b-0: 'bras bu de rnams thob pa'i @94b rgyu bstan to //
T02D2672:94b-1: rdo rje mtshon zhes bya ba'i dpes ni //
T02D2672:94b-2: las dang nyon mongs pa'i dra ba'i thigs po mtha' dag gcod cing 'bigs par bstan to //
T02D2672:94b-3: me zhes bya ba'i dpes ni /
T02D2672:94b-4: dug gsum gyi nags sbyor gyi tshang sting mtha' dag sreg par ston /
T02D2672:94b-5: gnam lcags zhes bya ba'i dpes ni ;
T02D2672:94b-6: bag la nyal phra mo lus pa rnams kyang dmigs kyis sel zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02D2672:94b-7: mi'i 'jig rten zhes bya ba ni bya ba'i rgyud
T02D2672:94b-8: 'dis mi rnams kyi don du gsungs pa'i shas che
T02D2672:94b-9: ba'i don to // 'jig rten 'di dang pha rol nyid na yang //
T02D2672:94b-10: sdug bsngal sel cing zhes bya ba ni phyag na rdo rje dbang bskur ba'i rgyud chen po las /
T02D2672:94b-12: tshe 'di la dngos grub la nges par gzhol bar 'gyur ba dang /
T02D2672:94b-13: shi 'phos nas kyang rdo rje'i rigs su gzhon nu'i
T02D2672:94b-14: lus thob par 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro
T02D2672:94b-15: // sdig 'joms zhes bya ba ni 'og nas /
T02D2672:94b-17: tshe rabs stong nas gnas pa'i sdig pa'i mun //
T02D2672:94b-18: bzlas brjod byas pas myur du sel bar byed //
T02D2672:94b-20: gzhan med do zhes bya ba ni gsang sngags 'dra ba'i 'dren pa med ces bshad pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2672:94b-21: gang zhig ces bya ba ni rig sngags kyi byin gyi rlabs gang gis zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2672:94b-22: dpag bsam ljon pa'i shing lta bur /
T02D2672:94b-23: zhes bya ba ni sems can rnams kyi re ba sna tshogs skong ba'i dper brjod pa'o //
T02D2672:94b-24: la lar dngos grub ces bya ba la sogs pas
T02D2672:94b-25: ni de'i phan yon gyi 'bras bu sna tshogs su
T02D2672:94b-26: phye ste bstan pa rnams kyi rnam grangs bkod pa'o
T02D2672:94b-27: // gsang sngags zhes bya ba ni gsang sngags rnams kyi lha de ni zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
T02D2672:94b-28: sna tshogs gzugs su rnam sprul nas //
T02D2672:94b-29: zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas la sogs pa dag pa'i gzugs dang /
T02D2672:94b-30: gnod sbyin la sogs pa ma dag pa'i gzugs su bstan pa'i don to ;
T02D2672:94b-31: / gang zhig sdug bsngal gang gis 'jigs skrag pa //
T02D2672:94b-32: zhes bya ba la sogs pas kyang /
T02D2672:94b-33: gsang sngags la brten pa'i phan yon gyi 'bras bu gzhan brjod pa'o //
T02D2672:94b-34: gang zhig ces bya ba ni rig sngags 'chang dngos
T02D2672:94b-35: grub chen po sgrub par mi rtsol ba rnams so
T02D2672:95a-1: bya ba ni dgon par ma spangs pa'am /
T02D2672:95a-2: 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la spyod pa'o //
T02D2672:95a-3: khyim zhes bya ba ni rab tu ma byung zhing 'cho tshis lhur len pa'o //
T02D2672:95a-4: dka' thub ma nyams zhes bya ba ni dam tshig rnams bsrungs pa'o //
T02D2672:95a-5: rtse gcig sems kyis zhes bya ba ni bzlas brjod yan lag dang ldan par byed pa'o //
T02D2672:95a-6: nyin gcig bzhin du cung zad sngags zlos na //
T02D2672:95a-7: zhes bya ba ni yi dam rgyun mi 'chad par byed ba'o //
